name: World's Scariest Trivia Game
description:
created for the Spooky Scoopy Scorpy Jam Game Jam. this was literally the first time i even touched gamemaker studio and uhhh. well it sure was a learning experience!

Content warning: some language, extremely minor sexual humor

Important info: its not recommended that u even play this if ur not familiar with scorpy's content, it kinda hinges entirely off of that. ALSO, there's no way to exit the game at the end, you just have to close it.
